info.title: Field Desgin Package Drawings Gathering API
info.description: API for gathering drawings like damage summary drawing, current engineering drawing, vendor drawing, and ISO drawing for FDP

post.summary: Gather drawinge for the specified fdp
post.description: Send the facility engineer for the provided fpd ID a plaintext URL that they can use to upload drawings. Also, return the tracking ID and status in plaintext.

parameters.name: fdpId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the open field design package

200.description: Collects fdp drawings from facility engineer through a pending documents upload URL

documentUploadUrl.description: URL for facility engineer to upload their pending documents

documentUploadTrackingId.description: Unique ID to track the status of the pending documents upload
